pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, March 30, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Truro, Nova Scotia

Private meetings

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the release of the final report of the Mass Casualty Commission. He will be joined by the Minister of Public Safety, Marco E. L. Mendicino, and the Minister of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship, Sean Fraser.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

The Prime Minister will speak with the President of the Dominican Republic, Luis Abinader.
